business_definition: Main record structure for disclosure group information with a record length of 50 bytes
Composite key identifying a unique disclosure group record, consisting of account group ID, transaction type code, and transaction category code
Account group identifier used to categorize accounts for disclosure purposes
Transaction type code identifying the category of transaction
Transaction category code providing detailed classification of the transaction
Interest rate associated with the disclosure group, stored as a signed numeric value with 4 integer digits and 2 decimal places
Reserved placeholder field used for data structure alignment, padding, or holding constant values
